title: N690 Townsend, N333 Hyde, N172 Ward, Griffith, Brouthers, E107 Dineen, E107 Dougherty
author: Brailey

posts.post_title: N690 Townsend, N333 Hyde, N172 Ward, Griffith, Brouthers, E107 Dineen, E107 Dougherty
posts.post_content:
Bills are piling up so some of my type cards and duplicates need to go.  Here is what I've added to my for sale site ( [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url] ):

19th Century:
N690 Kalamazoo Bats Sleepy Townsend SGC10  $850
N333 S.F. Hess Newsboys League Hyde SGC30 $750
N172 Old Judge Monte Ward with Bat New York SGC10 $425
N172 Old Judge Clark Griffith Minnesota SGC10 $350
N172 Old Judge Dan Brouthers Batting Boston PSA3 $1,000

Also early 20th Century:
E107 Breisch Williams Bill Dineen Boston A. SGC10 SOLD
E107 Breisch Williams Dougherty Boston A. Raw SOLD
E90-1 Mathewson SGC10 (pinhole) $450
T211 Red Sun Flood SGC40 SOLD
T206 Keeler Portrait El Principe de Gales SGC30 $260
T204 Ramly "Wee" Willie Keeler PSA2 $1,100
T204 Mordecai "3-Fingers" Brown PSA4 (MK - stamp on reverse) $800
T204 Clark Griffith PSA2 $350 

Scans available at [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url]

The go to the "Other 19th Century Cards" and the "Other 20th Century Cards" sections.

Please contact me at:  [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks for looking,
Mike

Mike,

Could you send me a scan of the Griffith?  

Thanks,

Fred

Fred,

Sorry for the delayed response but not sure why I didn't get notification of your request via my regular email (mikebrailey@yahoo.com).  

I can't seem to find a way to attach photos to the Net54 site.  Images can be viewed at:

[url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url] 
then go to the "Other 19th Century" album.  N172 Griffith images are numbers 9 & 10.

Mike
